heading: HB00558
0: AN ACT ABOLISHING IRRIGATION SERVICE FEES AND SUCH OTHER SIMILAR OR RELATED FEES FROM BENEFICIARIES OF IRRIGATION SYSTEMS FUNDED AND CONSTRUCTED BY, OR UNDER THE ADMINISTRATION OF THE NATIONAL IRRIGATION ADMINISTRATION, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE CERTAIN SECTIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 3601, PRESIDENTIAL DECREE NO. 552 AND PRESIDENTIAL DECREE NO. 1702
principal-authors: CASILAO, ARIEL "KA AYIK" B.; ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.; DE JESUS, EMMI A.; TINIO, ANTONIO L.; BROSAS, ARLENE D.; CASTRO, FRANCE L.; ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.;
mother-bill statusstatus: Republic Act RA10969 enacted on 2018-02-02 Substituted by HB05670
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00558
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ABOLISHING IRRIGATION SERVICE FEES AND SUCH OTHER SIMILAR OR RELATED FEES FROM BENEFICIARIES OF IRRIGATION SYSTEMS FUNDED AND CONSTRUCTED BY, OR UNDER THE ADMINISTRATION OF THE NATIONAL IRRIGATION ADMINISTRATION, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE CERTAIN SECTIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 3601, PRESIDENTIAL DECREE NO. 552 AND PRESIDENTIAL DECREE NO. 1702
SHORT TITLE : Free Irrigation Services Act 0f 2016
ABSTRACT : Seeks to provide the necessary and vital support services and assistance to farmers, including but not limited to inputs to production, production support, post-harvest facilities and irrigation services.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASILAO, ARIEL "KA AYIK" B., ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T., DE JESUS, EMMI A., TINIO, ANTONIO L., BROSAS, ARLENE D., CASTRO, FRANCE L., ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2016-11-22
          -A Technical Working Group was created to further study the NIA bills with Rep. NOEL VILLANUEVA as the Chairman, and co-chaired by Reps. Conrado Estrella and Cecilia Leonila Chavez.
      2. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-05-10
      3. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-05-10
          -Substitute Bill to House Bill Nos. 37, 189, 294, 526, 558, 1053, 1197, 1887, 1943, 2133, 2150, 2247, 2251, 2812, 2857, 2880, 2902, 3013, 3119, 3151, 3302, 3505, 3589, 3595, 3853, 4056, 4162, 4170 and 4358 was approved with amendment.
